712968f-a.title: Manhattan: 42nd Street - Park Avenue
712968f-a.text:
E. 42nd Street, at the S. W. corner ef Pershing Square
(Park Avenue),showing the new air terminal site. To the left
background is the Pershing Sduare Building. Note also the
Park Avenue vehicular viacuct. At the right is E. 41st Street.
November 1, 1939
0ift of George Jiranek
New York Public Library
Photestat Division

712967f.title: Manhattan: 42nd Street - Park Avenue
712967f.text:
E. 42nd Street, at the S. W. corner of Pershing Sduare
(Park Avenue), showing the future air terminal site. This
location has been vacant for years and formerly occupied by
the Belmont Hotel. The photographer is viewing southeastward
and shows in the left background, the Pershing Suare Building
(41st to 42nd Streets).
November 1, 1939
(Cift of George Jiranek
New York Public Library
Photostat ivision
